package hello;

public class hello {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int count = 0;
		int total =0;
		while(count<5)
		{
			int mark=95;
			total=total+mark;  // 0+95= 95 now total is 95
			count=count+1;     // 0+1 = 1 now count is 1
			System.out.println(total);
			//System.out.println(count);
		}
	}
}
